It's still a good game after all these years. New content is still coming out. It runs great on Linux, and it's not a resource hog.

but thats what makes a good game after all. so try it out for ur self.
i will say tho its can be a very expansive game if you want cosmetics. buy at your own risk.

The game itself is good but it could be better if there were less cheaters playing it. You have a lot of them in game no matter if you have prime or not. Still I will recommend it since it is the players who ruin it and you can still have fun if you don't get cheaters against you but Valve should really find a way to get rid of them.
